LanguageData.NerveSpiker.label: nerve spiker
LanguageData.NerveSpiker.description: A crossbow-like device that throws rough spikes embedded with a paralytic biotoxin. Low damage, but it stuns non-mechanoid targets. Large targets are more resistant to the biotoxin and will be stunned for less time.
LanguageData.NerveSpiker.tools.limb.label: limb
LanguageData.NerveSpiker.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: nerve spiker
LanguageData.NerveSpiker_Spike.label: nerve spike
